name: Swordsman Night King
description:
The game tells the story of a mysterious swordsman who arrives on a chaotic battlefield and helps good soldiers defeat evil.
The game only uses the left and right mouse buttons, the operation is simple and friendly, you can press the Esc key to exit the game during the game.

Swordsman Night King is an action-adventure game with no video – ears instead of eyes!
Explore the auditory sensory experience of sound.

Audio games that are fully accessible to the blind and visually impaired

Your eyes will be of no avail.
So get close to them, sharpen your hearing and your blades ...
Embark on a dramatic, dangerous adventure.

Experience the adventures of the legendary blind swordsman, the Night King! Outside of the visuals, you'll have to find the rhythm of attacks and dodges, use dodge skills to avoid unstoppable attacks, and face dangerous enemies!

Fully accessible to the visually impaired, this tense game is aimed at anyone craving an immersive sensory experience with a groundbreaking video game. And because the player is a character, it will help raise public awareness about this disability.

This hack-and-slash game has the flavor of heroic fantasy, taking advantage of the rhythm of sound, providing gripping soundscapes that bring the characters and movements around the player to life – as if they were actually in the game!
